'''Mythcon 15''' was the fifteenth annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference. 

*'''Theme:''' "The Wood Between the Worlds"
*'''Guests of Honor:''' Jane Yolen (fantasy author) and Paul F. Ford (Lewis scholar)
*'''Chairman:''' Eric Rauscher
